hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'packages/types'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && pnpm --filter @fintrak/types build 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git\s+push.*--force|git\s+push.*-f'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Force push detected. Use regular push or confirm with user.' >&2; exit 1; fi
